level.heading: Duties of registered agent.
level.text: The duties of a registered agent shall be to:
Forward to the represented entity at the address most recently supplied to the agent by the entity any process, notice, or demand that is served on the agent;
Provide the notices required by this title to the entity at the address most recently supplied to the agent by the entity;
If the agent is a noncommercial registered agent, keep current the information required by ยง 29-104.04(a) in the most recent registered agent filing for the entity; and
If the agent is a commercial registered agent, keep current the information listed for it under ยง 29-104.05(a).

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For history of Law 18-378, see notes under ยง 29-101.01.
